c74object.name: mlmat.load
c74object.description: Load data from file. Can load a number of file formats including CSV , TSV, PGM, and ARFF.

attribute.name: transpose
attribute.digest: If true, transpose the matrix after loading
attribute.description: If true, transpose the matrix after loading. (default = 1)

c74object.discussion: There are a number of file formats supported. These include: csv (comma-separated values), denoted by .csv or .txt tsv (tab-separated values), denoted by .tsv, .csv, or .txt ASCII (raw ASCII, with space-separated values), denoted by .txt Armadillo ASCII (Armadillo's text format with a header), denoted by .txt PGM, denoted by .pgm PPM, denoted by .ppm Armadillo binary, denoted by .bin Raw binary, denoted by .bin (note: this will be loaded as one-dimensional data, which is likely not what is desired.) ARFF, denoted by .arff.
